00050     class HistogramGroupData_t {
00051       friend class HistMgr;
00052     public:
00053       HistogramGroupData_t() : _refCounter(0),_id(static_cast<unsigned int>(-1)), _version(0) {};
00054 
00055       HistogramGroupData_t(std::string file_name, std::string folder_name)
00056         : _refCounter(0),_id(static_cast<unsigned int>(-1)),_fileName(file_name),_folderName(folder_name), _version(0) {};
00057 
00058       UInt_t id() const {return _id;};
00059       UInt_t version() const {return _version;};
00060       void incrementVersion() {_version++;};
00061       const std::string &fileName() const {return _fileName;};
00062       const std::string &folderName() const {return _folderName;};
00063 
00064       HistogramGroupData_t &setFileName(const std::string &file_name)    { _fileName=file_name;return *this;};
00065       HistogramGroupData_t &setFolderName(const std::string &folder_name)  {_folderName=folder_name; return *this;};
00066 
00067       void ref() {_refCounter++;};
00068       void unref() {--_refCounter;};
00069       UInt_t references() const {return _refCounter;};
00070 
00071       bool isReferenced() const {return _refCounter>0;};
00072 
00073     protected:
00074       void setId(unsigned int id) {_id=id;};
00075 
00076       UInt_t      _refCounter;  
00077       UInt_t      _id;          
00078       std::string _fileName;    
00079       std::string _folderName;  
00080       UInt_t      _version;     
00081     };

00210       bool hasCollection(ECollectionType type) const {
00211         const KeyMapBase_t *a_list=getNameList(type);
00212         return ! (a_list->empty());
00213       }
00214 
00218       std::pair<KeyMapBase_t::NameMap_t::const_iterator, KeyMapBase_t::NameMap_t::const_iterator> nameListIterators(ECollectionType type)  const {
00219         const KeyMapBase_t *a_list=getNameList(type);
00220         return std::make_pair(a_list->nameListBegin(), a_list->nameListEnd());
00221       }
00222 
00223     protected:
00224 
00225       const KeyMapBase_t *getNameListConst(ECollectionType &type) const {
00226         const KeyMapBase_t *a_list=0;
00227         switch (type) {
00228         case kH1:
00229           a_list=&_histogramList;
00230           break;
00231         case kH2:
00232           a_list=&_histogram2DList;
00233           break;
00234         case kProfile:
00235           a_list=&_profileList;
00236           break;
00237         case kGraph:
00238           a_list=&_graphList;
00239           break;
00240         default:
00241           a_list=0;
00242           throw std::runtime_error("HistMgr::getNameList> unsupported histogram/graph type.");
00243         }
00244 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00245         assert ( a_list );
00246 #endif
00247         return a_list;
00248       }
00249 
00250       const KeyMapBase_t *getNameList(ECollectionType &type) const {
00251         return getNameListConst(type);
00252       }
00253 
00254       KeyMapBase_t *getNameList(ECollectionType &type) {
00255         return const_cast<KeyMapBase_t *>(getNameListConst(type));
00256       }
00257

00261       KeyMap_t<accounting_ptr<ProfileCollection_t> > _profileList;
00262       KeyMap_t<accounting_ptr<GraphCollection_t> >     _graphList;

00279       return _histogramGroupList[group_key];
00280     }
00281 
00282   public:
00285     Group_t &getOrCreatehistogramGroup(const Key_t &group_key) {
00286       if (!histogramGroupExists(group_key)) {
00287         _histogramGroupList.assign(group_key,Group_t());
00288         _histogramGroupList[group_key].header().setId(group_key.id());
00289       }
00290       return _histogramGroupList[group_key];
00291     }

00299               ,_refCounter(0)
00300 #endif
00301     {  };

00614     FloatHistogram1D *getHistogram(const Key_t &group_key, const Key_t &hist_key, UInt_t index) {
00615 #ifdef HAVE_CALICEGUI
00616       Glib::Mutex::Lock lock (_histogramListLock);
00617 #endif
00618       return _histogramGroupList[group_key].histogramCollection(hist_key).histogram(index);
00619

00621       //    if (iter==_histograms.end()) {
00622       //      std::stringstream message;

00624       //      throw std::logic_error(message.str());

00813     bool exists(const Key_t &group_key, const Key_t &hist_key) const {
00814 #ifdef HAVE_CALICEGUI
00815       Glib::Mutex::Lock lock (_histogramListLock);
00816 #endif
00817       return ( _histogramGroupList.hasKey(group_key) && _histogramGroupList[group_key].histogramCollectionExists(hist_key));
00818       //    HistogramList_t::const_iterator iter=_histograms.find(group+"::"+collection_name);
00819       //    return iter!=_histograms.end();
00820     };

00840     const HistogramCollection_t &getHistogramCollection(const Key_t &group_key, const Key_t &hist_key) const {
00841 #ifdef HAVE_CALICEGUI
00842       Glib::Mutex::Lock lock (_histogramListLock);
00843 #endif
00844       return _histogramGroupList[group_key].histogramCollection(hist_key);

00964     void registerWriter(const std::string &name, HistWriterKit *kit) {
00965       if (!name.empty() && kit) {
00966         _writerKitList.insert(std::make_pair(name,kit));
00967         if (!_writerKit) _writerKit=kit;
00968       }
00969     };

01040     static HistMgr *getInstance() {
01041       if (!__histMgr) {
01042 #ifdef HAVE_CALICEGUI
01043         __instanceCounter++;
01044         if (__instanceCounter==1)
01045 #endif
01046           {
01047             HistMgr *a_hist_mgr=new HistMgr;
01048             __histMgr=a_hist_mgr;
01049             // ensure that glib thread package is initialised otherwise locking is not available.
01050             // can this be done more than once ?
01051             if (__histMgr!=a_hist_mgr) {
01052               delete a_hist_mgr;
01053 #ifdef HAVE_CALICEGUI
01054               __instanceCounter--;
01055 #endif
01056             }
01057           }
01058 #ifdef HAVE_CALICEGUI
01059         else {
01060           while (!__histMgr) {
01061             usleep(10000);
01062           }
01063         }
01064 #endif
01065       }
01066       return __histMgr;
01067     };
01068     static  void deleteInstance();
01069 
01070   protected:
01071     std::map<std::string, HistWriterKit *> _writerKitList;
01072     HistWriterKit *_writerKit;
01073 
01074     //HistogramList_t  _histograms;
01075     //  HistogramGroupList_t  _groups;
01076 
01077     static HistMgr *__histMgr;
01078 #ifdef HAVE_CALICEGUI
01079     HistMgr *ref() {
01080       Glib::Mutex::Lock lock (_histogramListLock);
01081       _refCounter++;
01082       return __histMgr;
01083     };
01084     void unref() {
01085       {
01086         Glib::Mutex::Lock lock (_histogramListLock);
01087         --_refCounter;
01088       }
01089       if (_deleteIfUnused && _refCounter==0) {
01090         deleteInstance();
01091       }
01092     };
01093     bool isUnused() {
01094       Glib::Mutex::Lock lock (_histogramListLock);
01095       return _refCounter==0;
01096     };
01097 
01098     bool _deleteIfUnused;
01099     UInt_t _refCounter;
01100     static UInt_t __instanceCounter;
01101     static Glib::StaticMutex _histogramListLock;
01102 #endif
01103     static const char *__typeName[kNTypes];
01104   };
01105 
01106   class HistMgrPtr
01107   {
01108   public:
01109     HistMgrPtr(HistMgr *an_instance)
01110 #ifdef HAVE_CALICEGUI
01111       : _instance(an_instance->ref())
01112 #endif
01113     {};
01114 
01115     ~HistMgrPtr() {
01116 #ifdef HAVE_CALICEGUI
01117       _instance->unref();
01118 #endif
01119     };
01120 
01121     operator bool() {return _instance!=0;};
01122 
01123     HistMgr *const operator->() {
01124       return _instance;
01125     };
01126 
01127     const HistMgr * const operator->() const {
01128       return _instance;
01129     };
01130 
01131     HistMgr * const operator*() {
01132       return _instance;
01133     };
01134 
01135     const HistMgr  *const operator*() const {
01136       return _instance;
01137     };
01138 
01139   private:
01140     HistMgr *_instance;
01141   };
01142 }
